text: Thomas Scanlon (16 August 1899 – 29 August 1951) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Thomas Scanlon's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1899 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Tommy Scanlon
